term: Why did Adams never forgive Hamilton for his election?
content:
“Adams never forgave Hamilton for the fact that he became President by three votes”
hamilton is also going to be in the scene
	he is not on good terms with adams
	he tries to get southern federalists to vote for pinckney since he wasn’t good with adams
	the NE federalists said screw it and they voted for adams

the federalists should have had it in the bag; they should have their candidates as the top two vote-getters, but their inner trouble with voting and hamilton caused these results: Adams 71; TJ 68; T.Pinckney 59
